items.summary: Implement backend support for playlist favorites saved per authenticated user (Internet Identity principal), including endpoints used by the frontend: `getPlaylistFavorites()` and `togglePlaylistFavorite(playlistName: Text)`.

Fix the mobile playlist Favorites UI so tapping “Add to Favorites” / “Remove from Favorites” in the mobile playlist overflow menu successfully saves per-user favorites via the backend and updates UI state.

Fix the mobile playlist Share action so it generates a playlist deep link using the same hash/query deep-link pattern used for songs (playlist instead of song) and allows users to share via native share sheet when supported, otherwise copies to clipboard, without redesigning the menu.
